QuestData.Title: Besting a Boar
QuestData.Description: The great boars of Gorgrond appear to serve as both a mount and an excellent source of food. Having a few of them in the garrison would not be an unwise idea.$B$BI have created for you another rope, should you wish to ride one down. Be wary of the Iron Horde presence nearby.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Boar Lasso on a Young Rocktusk and follow it until it is tamed.
